itunes:title: #38: Healing Intellectual Trauma (Student Highlight)
title: #38: Healing Intellectual Trauma (Student Highlight)
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Intellectual trauma can impact how we show up in the world, how we feel about ourselves, and truly block us. In this podcast episode, I help one of my students walk through it!   MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODEThe Recovery School –  FREE DOWNLOAD ...
itunes:summary:
Intellectual trauma can impact how we show up in the world, how we feel about ourselves, and truly block us. In this podcast episode, I help one of my students walk through it!
